title: Dubai Marina Wellness Spa
content:
Sanctuary of Wellbeing

This 1,000 sqm luxury spa in Dubai Marina creates a tranquil escape from urban life. The design draws inspiration from natural elements—water, stone, and light—to create a multi-sensory wellness journey.

Holistic Design

Every element was chosen to promote relaxation and rejuvenation. From the moment guests enter, they’re transported to a serene environment through carefully controlled lighting, soothing sounds, and aromatic experiences.

Spa Amenities

  • 1,000 sqm luxury wellness facility
  • 8 treatment rooms including couples’ suites
  • Hydrotherapy pool and vitality pool
  • Turkish hammam and Finnish sauna
  • Relaxation lounge with Marina views
  • Manicure and pedicure stations
  • Private yoga and meditation studio
  • Retail boutique for wellness products

Sensory Experience

We designed a progressive sensory journey through different zones. Warm materials like teak and stone contrast with cool marble surfaces. Water features provide ambient sound, while indirect lighting creates a peaceful atmosphere.

Business Impact

The spa achieved profitability within 6 months and maintains 85% average occupancy. It has won wellness design awards and is rated among Dubai’s top spa destinations.
excerpt: 1,000 sqm luxury wellness spa with hydrotherapy pools, hammam, treatment rooms, and Marina views.

title: Palm Jumeirah Beach Villa
content:
Coastal Luxury Living

This spectacular beachfront villa on Palm Jumeirah’s crescent offers 1,200 sqm of luxurious living space with unobstructed views of the Arabian Gulf and Dubai skyline. Our design celebrates indoor-outdoor living.

Architectural Integration

We worked closely with architects to create seamless transitions between interior and exterior spaces. Floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors, covered terraces, and infinity pools blur the boundaries between inside and out.

Villa Highlights

  • 1,200 sqm luxury beachfront villa
  • 6 bedroom suites with sea views
  • Open-plan living and dining areas
  • Professional home cinema
  • Fully equipped home gym and spa
  • Infinity pool and jacuzzi
  • Private beach access
  • Underground garage for 6 vehicles

Material Palette

We selected materials that withstand the coastal environment: marine-grade stainless steel, treated teak, UV-resistant fabrics, and special coatings for metalwork. The palette emphasizes natural tones that complement the beachfront setting.

Client Delight

“Our villa has exceeded every expectation. Mouhajer Design created a home that’s both a showcase property and a comfortable family retreat. The attention to detail is extraordinary.” – Villa Owner
excerpt: 1,200 sqm beachfront villa on Palm Jumeirah featuring seamless indoor-outdoor living with infinity pool and private beach access.

title: La Petite Maison Restaurant
content:
Culinary Design Excellence

This renowned French-Mediterranean restaurant required a design that honors its Nice origins while embracing Dubai’s cosmopolitan energy. The 350 sqm space creates an intimate yet vibrant dining atmosphere.

Design Concept

Inspired by the French Riviera, we incorporated natural materials, warm lighting, and an open kitchen concept that makes dining a theatrical experience. The design balances sophistication with approachability.

Restaurant Features

  • 350 sqm fine dining space
  • Open show kitchen with chef’s counter
  • Indoor seating for 120 guests
  • Outdoor terrace with 40 seats
  • Private dining room for 16
  • Custom wine display
  • Acoustic design for optimal conversation

Atmosphere Creation

Lighting plays a crucial role, with custom fixtures creating warm pools of light at each table while maintaining an energetic overall ambiance. Acoustic panels are integrated seamlessly into the design.

Success Story

The restaurant consistently operates at full capacity with a three-week waiting list. It has received multiple culinary and design awards and is considered one of Dubai’s most iconic dining destinations.
excerpt: 350 sqm French-Mediterranean restaurant with open kitchen, custom wine displays, and Riviera-inspired design.

title: Jumeirah Medical Center
content:
Healing Environment Design

This state-of-the-art medical center in Jumeirah combines clinical excellence with patient comfort. The 2,000 sqm facility includes specialized clinics, diagnostic imaging, and outpatient services.

Evidence-Based Design

We applied evidence-based design principles to reduce patient stress and support healing. Natural light, calming colors, wayfinding clarity, and acoustic control were key considerations throughout the space.

Facility Features

  • 2,000 sqm multi-specialty medical center
  • 15 consultation rooms with natural light
  • Advanced diagnostic imaging suite
  • Pharmacy and laboratory facilities
  • Comfortable waiting areas
  • Infection control compliant materials
  • Accessible design throughout

Patient Experience

We designed separate circulation paths for patients and staff to ensure privacy and efficiency. Waiting areas feature comfortable seating, natural materials, and views of healing gardens.

Outcome

Patient satisfaction scores increased by 35% compared to the previous facility. The center has received healthcare design awards and serves as a model for future medical facilities.
excerpt: 2,000 sqm medical center featuring evidence-based design principles, natural light, and patient-centered healing environments.

title: City Walk Flagship Retail Store
content:
Retail Experience Design

This flagship store for an international luxury fashion brand creates an immersive shopping experience in Dubai’s City Walk. The 600 sqm space blends the brand’s European heritage with contemporary Dubai energy.

Design Philosophy

We created a journey through the brand’s DNA using carefully curated materials, custom lighting, and interactive display systems. Every element was designed to enhance product presentation and customer engagement.

Store Features

  • 600 sqm retail space across two levels
  • Custom bronze and marble fixtures
  • Interactive digital mirror technology
  • Private VIP shopping lounge
  • Flexible display systems
  • Integrated inventory management
  • Dramatic façade lighting

Customer Journey

The store layout guides customers through distinct zones, from casual browsing areas to private fitting rooms and a luxurious VIP lounge. Strategic lighting highlights products while creating an inviting atmosphere.

Results

The store exceeded sales targets by 40% in its first year and has become one of the brand’s highest-performing locations globally. It has won retail design awards and been featured in international design publications.
excerpt: 600 sqm flagship retail store creating an immersive luxury shopping experience with custom fixtures and interactive technology.

title: DIFC Corporate Headquarters
content:
Transforming Corporate Spaces

This flagship headquarters for a leading financial services firm reimagines the modern workplace. Spanning 3,500 sqm in Dubai International Financial Centre, the design prioritizes employee wellbeing, collaboration, and brand expression.

Workspace Innovation

We created diverse work zones including open collaboration areas, private focus rooms, informal meeting lounges, and wellness spaces. The design encourages movement and interaction while providing acoustic privacy where needed.

Project Features

  • 3,500 sqm of flexible workspace design
  • Activity-based working zones
  • Biophilic design with living plant walls
  • Advanced acoustic engineering
  • Wellness room and fitness center
  • Collaborative technology integration
  • Sustainable materials and LEED certification

Sustainability Focus

The project achieved LEED Platinum certification through sustainable material selection, energy-efficient lighting, and water conservation systems. We incorporated recycled materials and locally sourced furniture wherever possible.

Impact

Post-occupancy surveys show a 45% increase in employee satisfaction and 30% improvement in collaboration metrics. The space has become a key talent attraction and retention tool for the client.
excerpt: Modern 3,500 sqm corporate headquarters featuring activity-based design, biophilic elements, and LEED Platinum certification.

title: Downtown Dubai Penthouse
content:
Urban Luxury Redefined

This exclusive penthouse occupies the top two floors of one of Downtown Dubai’s most prestigious towers, offering 360-degree views of the Burj Khalifa and Dubai skyline. Our design philosophy centered on creating a sophisticated sanctuary in the sky.

Interior Concept

We embraced a contemporary aesthetic with clean lines, premium materials, and a neutral color palette that allows the stunning views to take center stage. Every element was carefully curated to create a cohesive, luxurious environment.

Design Highlights

  • 800 sqm of luxury living space across two levels
  • Floor-to-ceiling windows maximizing natural light
  • Private rooftop terrace with infinity pool
  • Custom Italian kitchen with Gaggenau appliances
  • Master suite with spa-inspired bathroom
  • Home theater and wine cellar
  • Smart home automation throughout

Material Selection

We sourced the finest materials globally: Calacatta marble from Italy, white oak flooring from France, custom bronze fixtures, and bespoke furniture pieces from renowned European craftsmen.

Client Testimonial

“Mouhajer Design transformed our vision into reality. Every detail exceeds our expectations, from the custom millwork to the intelligent lighting design. This is truly our dream home.” – Private Client
excerpt: Ultra-modern 800 sqm penthouse with panoramic Burj Khalifa views featuring bespoke design and smart home integration.

title: Luxury Hotel Al Maha Desert Resort
content:
Project Vision

Al Maha Desert Resort represents the pinnacle of luxury hospitality design in the Arabian desert. Our vision was to create an oasis of tranquility that seamlessly integrates with the natural desert landscape while providing world-class luxury amenities.

Design Approach

Drawing inspiration from traditional Bedouin architecture, we incorporated natural materials, earth tones, and flowing fabrics to create an authentic yet luxurious desert experience. Each suite was designed to maximize privacy while offering breathtaking views of the surrounding dunes.

Key Features

  • 42 private luxury suites with infinity pools
  • Award-winning spa and wellness center
  • Fine dining restaurant with panoramic desert views
  • Traditional Bedouin-inspired architecture
  • Sustainable design with solar power integration
  • Private wildlife reserve access

Sustainability

The resort incorporates cutting-edge sustainability features including solar panels, water recycling systems, and locally sourced materials. We worked closely with environmental consultants to minimize the ecological footprint while maintaining luxury standards.

Results

The completed resort has won multiple international design awards and maintains a 98% guest satisfaction rating. It has become one of the UAE’s most sought-after luxury destinations.
excerpt: Award-winning luxury desert resort featuring 42 private suites with authentic Bedouin-inspired design and sustainable architecture.
